pull.title: [Qt] Use flexible font size for QRCode image address
pull.body: Bech32 addresses are currently cut off in the QRCode image in the GUI receive tab. This adds a simple font size calculation logic that "must" (down to 4pt) fix into the given image width. Examples OSX HiDPI: Examples Ubuntu non HIDPI:

milestone.description: This will be the release of segwit wallet. ðŸŽ‰

events.message: Use flexible font size for QRCode image address

comments.body: Please factor this out into a function: this makes it easier to read and I think this might come in useful in other places as well.
Since we are nitting: Also, `font_size` (camel case).
